name: GMail 2 - Grays and Blues Redux
description:
I'm a huge fan of style 4538, but it has fallen behind on a few bug fixes and tweaks, so I've decided to post my version. This style works best with GMail Full Width 2: http://userscripts.org/scripts/show/15998

Please leave feedback in the comments...

04/05/08: Initial upload. GReader style coming up soon!
